tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_demand_forecasting (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    demand_kwh FLOAT,
    forecasted_demand_kwh FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE energy_demand_forecast (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    forecast_date DATE,
    forecast_time TIME,
    forecast_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE charging_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    scheduled_date DATE,
    scheduled_time TIME,
    charging_station_id INT,
    charging_status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE charging_station (
    station_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    total_chargers INT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionForecast (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	date DATE,
	hour INT,
	energy_demand DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ChargingStations (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	station_name VARCHAR,
	location VARCHAR,
	capacity INT,
	available_spots INT
)

CREATE TABLE ChargingEvents (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	station_id INT,
	date DATE,
	start_time TIME,
	end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyPrices (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	date DATE,
	time TIME,
	price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherForecast (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	date DATE,
	hour INT,
	temperature DECIMAL
)
